BIT

Class SolverInstrumentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • BIT.SolverInstrumentation

  • public class SolverInstrumentation
extends java.lang.Object
    Solver Instrumentalist and responsible for the corresponding Metrics.

    • Method Detail

      • getSolverMetrics

        private static SolverInstrumentation.SolverMetrics getSolverMetrics()
        Gets the Solver Metrics of the given Request.
        Returns:
        Metrics of the Solver executing in a given Thread.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Instruments the Class Files contained in the provided Directory. The Metric used is the Number of Routine Calls.
        Parameters:
        args - CommandLine Arguments containing: Class Files Directory, Solver Directory.

      • popSolverMetrics

        public static SolverInstrumentation.SolverMetrics popSolverMetrics()
        Pops the Solver Metrics of the given Request.
        Returns:
        Metrics of the Solver executing in a given Thread.

      • routineCallCount

        public static void routineCallCount(int ignored)
        Counts the Number of executed Routines.
        Parameters:
        ignored - (Unused) Merely to comply with the BIT Callback Specification.
